entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 08:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
